Better Presentations

Total Time: Under 10 minutes

I've had a few people ask me for advice on how I approach creating presentations. This was broken out from my "Choose your own adventure" talk that I didn't get to cover, but I felt this is worth recording and releasing to help anyone with curiosity about my approach to making presentations.
